column1: To maximize the return on your investment in the least amount of time.  Potential buyers browse the internet when looking for a home.  KMB Staging connects with those browsers by incorporating proven formulas such as organizing, de-cluttering and reconfiguring your furnishings in order to emphasize the benefits and potential of your home thereby making it appeal to a much broader audience.

column2: Real Estate Professionals who add staging services as an extra value to their clients provide a competitive edge over other Professionals especially in slower seasons.  When marketing to home sellers as a Real Estate Professional you can use previous staging stats, testimonials, and photos to show you go above and beyond the competition with great results!

By partnering with a stager to help a homeowner prepare the home for sale, give a consultation and showcase the house, a Real Estate Professional will have more time to spend on other aspects of getting the home sold.  A home seller will feel well taken care of.
As a stager, my job is to communicate with tact and professionalism to your clients about what needs to happen with their homes before they can go on the market.
